lead_paragraph: NRG Energy has become a cautionary tale for power producers trying to figure out how to generate more electricity while curbing greenhouse gas emissions.

headline.print_headline: The Messy Business of Clean Power
headline.main: How Producing Clean Power Turned Out to Be a Messy Business

snippet: NRG Energy has become a cautionary tale for power producers trying to figure out how to generate more electricity while curbing greenhouse gas emissions....
abstract: NRG Energy, country’s biggest independent power producer, is grappling with accomplishing two incongruent goals--becoming pioneer of sustainable energy and providing electricity to millions of customers; company has made several investments in renewable energy that failed to create profits and caused loss in investor confidence; its struggle indicates how difficult it is for large power companies to stop burning fuel and transition to clean energy.
